strings.heading: Granules
strings.description: They are nanoscale fluid compartments containing newly synthesized RNA, RNA processing proteins, and mitoribosome assembly

strings.heading: Ribosome
strings.description: It is responsible for synthesizing proteins encoded by the mitochondrial DNA

strings.heading: Cristae
strings.description: They are folds in the inner membrane of mitochondria that increase the surface area for chemical reactions

strings.heading: Intermembrane space
strings.description: small, aqueous compartment located between the outer and inner mitochondrial membranes
